title: Twisted Little Truths
description: They dragged the boy I loved from my arms and accused him of a murder I know he didn't commit. Now all I want is revenge.But with secrets from my past dredged up at every turn, I have no idea who to trust.We’ve lived through the lies. It’s time for the truth to be revealed. No matter the cost.They say the truth will set you free. But in Saint View, it might just kill you first.The explosive conclusion to the Saint View High trilogy. Twisted Little Truths is the story of three bad boys and a girl who knows how to stand her ground. It is a mature high school/new adult, #whychoose romance, meaning the main character has more than one love interest. This book contains enemies-to-lovers and bullying themes and there may be triggers for some readers. It is the third and final book in an ongoing trilogy and cannot be read as a standalone.Reading Order:Devious Little LiarsDangerous Little SecretsTwisted Little Truths
author: Elle Thorpe
